About

# Offical blog site for the melody bot.

Current Bot version is 0.3.0b.

This is a site for posting blogs about our discord bot; Melody. If you don't know what Melody is click here. (opens new window) Here are some important links:

  • Add Melody to your server (opens new window)
  • Javacord (opens new window)
  • Documentation for Melody bot
  • Trello (opens new window)

Made by DisBots Inc. consisting of Game Glide (opens new window) and Aktindo. (opens new window)
